title: Instaclone
description: A fully functional, fully responsive clone of the popular social network Instagram. Made using the MERN stack and socket.io for realtime notifications so you can interact with your friends.

title: CRWN Clothing
description: Clothing E-Commerce app built with React, Redux, Passportjs, Firebase and Stripe.

title: Portfolio
description: The website you are currently viewing! Made with Gatsbyjs, Graphql and Styled Components.
